trans-unit.source: Enables users to change page-related print settings, including margins and paper orientation.
This class cannot be inherited.

The PageSetupDialog dialog box modifies the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> information for a given <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog.Document%2A>.
The user can enable sections of the dialog box to manipulate printing and margins; paper orientation, size, and source; and to show Help and network buttons.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog.MinMargins%2A> property defines the minimum margins a user can select.
When you create an instance of the PageSetupDialog class, the read/write properties are set to initial values.
For a list of these values, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog.%23ctor%2A> constructor.

Because a PageSetupDialog needs page settings to display, you need to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.Document%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.PrinterSettings%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog.PageSettings%2A> property before calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog.ShowDialog%2A>; otherwise, an exception will occur.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog"></xref> class.
When an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog> is created, the following properties are initialized to the specified values.

|Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog.AllowMargins%2A>|`true`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog.AllowOrientation%2A>|`true`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog.AllowPaper%2A>|`true`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog.AllowPrinter%2A>|`true`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog.Document%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog.MinMargins%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog.PageSettings%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog.PrinterSettings%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog.ShowHelp%2A>|`false`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog.ShowNetwork%2A>|`true`| You can change the value for any of these properties through a separate call to the property.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the margins section of the dialog box is enabled.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the margins section of the dialog box is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the orientation section of the dialog box (landscape versus portrait) is enabled.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the orientation section of the dialog box is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the paper section of the dialog box (paper size and paper source) is enabled.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the paper section of the dialog box is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the **Printer** button is enabled.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the **Printer** button is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value indicating the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> to get page settings from.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> to get page settings from.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the margin settings, when displayed in millimeters, should be automatically converted to and from hundredths of an inch.

The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings> class measures <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Margins%2A?displayProperty=fullName> in hundredths of an inch, but the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog> allows users to set margins in inches or millimeters depending on the culture settings for the system running the application.
In the .NET Framework version 2.0, you should set this property to `true` if your application could be used in cultures that measure document margins in millimeters.
If you are doing this conversion yourself, as was required in versions of the .NET Framework earlier than version 2.0, you should use the default value of `false`.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the margins should be automatically converted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value indicating the minimum margins, in hundredths of an inch, the user is allowed to select.
The minimum margins, in hundredths of an inch, the user is allowed to select.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value indicating the page settings to modify.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"></xref> to modify.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the printer settings that are modified when the user clicks the Printer button in the dialog.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings"></xref> to modify when the user clicks the Printer button.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Resets all options to their default values.
To be added.
To be added.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the **Help** button is visible.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the **Help** button is visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the **Network** button is visible.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the **Network** button is visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
